meanings.definition: Situated or occurring on the side facing toward the axis.
meanings.sent1: The adaxial part of the leaf receives more sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The adaxial surface of the leaf is smooth.
meanings.sent3: The adaxial side of the leaf always wants to be closer to the stem.
meanings.sent4: Her adaxial perspective on the situation gave her a unique insight.
meanings.sent5: The adaxial position of the flower made it stand out in the garden.

meanings.definition: Relating to or situated on the side of an organ or organism that is facing toward the axis.
meanings.sent1: The adaxial veins of the leaf provide structural support.
meanings.sent2: The adaxial position of the heart is crucial for blood flow.
meanings.sent3: The adaxial orientation of the bird's feathers helped it fly straight.
meanings.sent4: His adaxial approach to problem-solving always led to innovative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The adaxial location of the nest ensured protection from the elements.
